<table width='100%' border='5px' cellspacing='5px' cellpadding='5px'>
<tr id='r1'>
<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item1' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr1');">Se la lernanto scius bone sian lecionon, la instruanto lin ne punus.</a>
<div id='tr1'><mark>If the pupil knew his lesson well, the teacher would not punish him.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item2' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr2');">Se vi scius, kiu li estas, vi lin pli estimus.</a>
<div id='tr2'><mark>If you knew who he is, you would esteem him more.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item3' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr3');">Ili levis unu manon supren, kvazaŭ ili ion tenus.</a>
<div id='tr3'><mark>They raised one hand upwards as if they were holding something.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item4' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr4');">Se mi efektive estus bela, aliaj penus min imiti.</a>
<div id='tr4'><mark>If I really were beautiful, others would try to imitate me.</mark></div></td>
</tr>
<tr id='r2'>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item5' href='#r1' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr5');">Ho! se mi jam havus la aĝon de dekkvin jaroj!</a>
<div id='tr5'><mark>Oh! if I were (had) already the age of fifteen years!</mark></div></td>

</tr>
